domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: I saw a poll yesterday that had the tories at 51% what is happening in this country when a govt lies with impunity and they get cheered for it? People are dying, we're heading for economic ruin, a #NoDealBrexit is on the way and still they love Boris, fucking depressing #COVID19
